00201 
00202 /* workaround for trivial but noticeable camera bug caused by imprecision
00203  * between view border calculation in 2D/3D space, workaround for bug [#28037].
00204  * without this deifne we get the old behavior which is to try and align them
00205  * both which _mostly_ works fine, but when the camera moves beyond ~1000 in
00206  * any direction it starts to fail */
00207 #define VIEW3D_CAMERA_BORDER_HACK
00208 #ifdef VIEW3D_CAMERA_BORDER_HACK
00209 extern float view3d_camera_border_hack_col[4];
00210 extern short view3d_camera_border_hack_test;
00211 #endif
